memberdef.name: CEREAL_RAPIDJSON_SCHEMA_HANDLE_BEGIN_
memberdef.initializer: if (!valid_) return false; \ if (!BeginValue() || !CurrentSchema().method arg1) {\ CEREAL_RAPIDJSON_SCHEMA_HANDLE_BEGIN_VERBOSE_();\ return valid_ = false;\ }

memberdef.name: CEREAL_RAPIDJSON_SCHEMA_HANDLE_PARALLEL_
memberdef.initializer: for (Context* context = schemaStack_.template Bottom<Context>(); context != schemaStack_.template End<Context>(); context++) {\ if (context->hasher)\ static_cast<HasherType*>(context->hasher)->method arg2;\ if (context->validators)\ for (SizeType i_ = 0; i_ < context->validatorCount; i_++)\ static_cast<GenericSchemaValidator*>(context->validators[i_])->method arg2;\ if (context->patternPropertiesValidators)\ for (SizeType i_ = 0; i_ < context->patternPropertiesValidatorCount; i_++)\ static_cast<GenericSchemaValidator*>(context->patternPropertiesValidators[i_])->method arg2;\ }
